verses.text: Ex schekab' Jehová, alec wach' lolonel t'a Jehová chi'. Alec wach' lolonel t'ay mach ex tze tanhwej stemplo tzek' ak'wal.
Ik'eck'e wan he k'ab' t'a stojolal skajnub' Jehová, tzeyalan wach' lolonel t'ay.
Ha Jehová b'oannac satcha’anh yet' lum lum tik, aokab' tz'ak'ancot swach'k'olal t'a eyib'anh masanto t'a lum tzalan Sion.
